snippet.title: Hordes of Hunger - Official Teaser Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description: Watch the creepy new trailer of Hordes of Hunger, an upcoming action arena slasher game with rogue-lite elements. Hordes of Hunger is set in the dark fantasy setting of Ismer-- a land engulfed by the living hunger, the cosmic horror known only as the Beast. You are the unlucky one still living inside the nightmare and the only way out is through it. Hordes of Hunger will be available on PC.
